visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a polar column chart with an inverted axis. The chart should have a title 'Updating points', with custom styling for axes and labels. The data series should include a single series with values ranging from 0 to 10. The chart should also have a color axis with a minimum color of '#90ed7d'. Additionally, the chart should update its data points every second with random values between 0 and 10.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a polar column chart with an inverted axis. The chart is titled 'Updating points' and includes a color axis with a minimum color of '#90ed7d'. The x-axis and y-axis are configured with specific tick intervals and label styles. The data series consists of a single series with values ranging from 0 to 10. The chart is set to update its data points every second with random values between 0 and 10, simulating dynamic data updates. This configuration leverages Highcharts' capabilities to create an interactive and visually appealing chart.
